com.bigdata.blueprints

Class BigdataGraphClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.blueprints.BigdataGraph
      • com.bigdata.blueprints.BigdataGraphClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Graph

    public class BigdataGraphClient
extends BigdataGraph
    This is a thin-client implementation of a Blueprints wrapper around the client library that interacts with the NanoSparqlServer. This is a functional implementation suitable for writing POCs - it is not a high performance implementation by any means (currently does not support caching or batched update). Does have a single "bulk upload" operation that wraps a method on RemoteRepository that will POST a graphml file to the blueprints layer of the bigdata server.
    Author:
    mikepersonick
    See Also:
    BigdataSailRemoteRepository}, BigdataSailRemoteRepositoryConnection}, RemoteRepository}
